title: In Democratic runoff for South Texas congressional seat, nonprofit backing a candidate is accused of campaign finance violations - The Texas Tribune
content: In Democratic runoff for South Texas congressional seat, nonprofit backing a candidate is accused of campaign finance violations  The Texas Tribune
description: Michelle Vallejo faces Ruben Ramirez in a runoff for the Democratic nomination in the 15th Congressional District. A nonprofit that supports Vallejo is accused of breaking campaign finance rules.
